Package org.aoplib4j.modularity

Package containing the classes for expressing the modularity concept.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ViolationInformation Interface containing the information about the boundary violation; what class violated the boundary and what class and what method was called).
 

Class Summary
BoundaryViolationCallback Abstract class that must be extended for coding the behavior when a boundary is violated.
LogViolationCallback Default implementation for the boundary violation.
 

Enum Summary
ListType Enumeration containing the possible types of lists.
 

Annotation Types Summary
Aoplib4jClassBoundary Annotation to mark the classes on which the class boundary calls should be applied.
Aoplib4jInjectedPkgBoundary Annotation that should be added to classes of a package annotated with Aoplib4jPackageBoundary in order to check the package boundary violation.
Aoplib4jPackageBoundary Annotation to mark the classes on which the package boundary calls should be applied.
 

Package org.aoplib4j.modularity Description

Package containing the classes for expressing the modularity concept.
